title: Accurate
review: After almost 2 decades on these rigs and 9 as a Rig Supt./Senior toolpusher the movie is about 90% accurate. There is an obvious challenge between the Company man and the Senior toolpusher as their mandates are different. I have seen mud coming out of the riser and blowing up the derrick - whomever consulted this did a 100% job and . . . . they listened. Incredibly well done.
